title: Linate 2001-October-08 Accident Report
description:
This is the official report on the investigation of the accident 2001-Oct-08 where a Boeing MD-87 (SE-DMA) and a Cessna 525-A (D-IEVX) collided on the runway 36R of Milano/linate airport (LIML/LIN) in Italy.

The tragic accident left all 114 aircraft occupants and 4 airport employees dead, may they rest in peace, while 4 other airport employees were injured.

The report consists of documents in Adobe Acrobat (.pdf) format plus 5 video files in MPEG4 format (.avi) of animations. All files are packed in a single Zip archive (.zip).

The report is available in English and Italian.

Documents:
==========

Final report from ANSV (approved 2004-Jan-20)

Report attachments A..Z, AA..AV (48 in total)

Animations:
===========

1. Collision dynamics (in optimum visibility conditions - real world fog not present) simultaneous showing the path of both aircraft

2. Collision dynamics (in optimum visibility conditions - real world fog not present) showing the take-off trajectory of the MD-87

3. Collision dynamics in reduced visibility conditions (200 m) showing take-off trajectory of the MD-87 + the simultaneous view from the Cessna cockpit

4. Collision dynamics in redoced visibility conditions (200 m) showing the take-off trajectory of the MD-87

5. Collision dynamics in redoced visibility conditions (200 m) showing the view of take-off trajectory from the MD-87 cockpit with basic flight instruments
